body_html:
Any news on this?
I'm having the same problem. PyTorch is very slow on CPU, it's also only using 2-3 cores with 16 cores available. With TF it is no problem to use ~8-10 cores. Which also results in much better performance.

Setting any value for OMP_NUM_THREADS makes it only worse.

body:
Any news on this?
I'm having the same problem. PyTorch is very slow on CPU, it's also only using 2-3 cores with 16 cores available. With TF it is no problem to use ~8-10 cores. Which also results in much better performance.

Setting any value for OMP_NUM_THREADS makes it only worse.
